entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 29.
